headline: Klarna post-IPO rating, Ralph Lauren outlook, Hershey upgrade
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to take a look at some of Tuesday's trading session's trending tickers and stories: Wall Street initiating coverage of Klarna (KLAR), Ralph Lauren's (RL) weak growth outlook, and Goldman Sachs analysts upgrading the Hershey Company (HSY). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Ralph Lauren, Dave & Buster's, Google UK deal: Trending Tickers
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including Ralph Lauren's (RL) three-year sales guidance, Dave & Buster's (PLAY) stock losses after missing on earnings estimates, and Google's (GOOG, GOOGL) AI deal in the UK valued at $6.8 billion.
